meanings.definition: An expectation that is too high or unrealistic.
meanings.sent1: Her overexpectation of getting a perfect score led to disappointment.
meanings.sent2: His overexpectation of always winning made him work harder.
meanings.sent3: The overexpectation of finding a unicorn in the backyard made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: The overexpectation of immediate success is like chasing a rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The overexpectation of a flawless performance set her up for failure.

meanings.definition: The act of expecting too much.
meanings.sent1: Their overexpectation of constant praise made them feel entitled.
meanings.sent2: The overexpectation of perfection can lead to anxiety.
meanings.sent3: The team's overexpectation of an easy victory was shattered by a strong opponent.
meanings.sent4: His overexpectation of always being right caused conflicts with others.
meanings.sent5: The overexpectation of immediate results can be frustrating.
